text: Balzaminov's Marriage () is a 1964 Soviet comedy movie directed by Konstantin Voynov.Россияне назвали любимые роли Георгия ВицинаЖЕНИТЬБА БАЛЬЗАМИНОВА (1964) It stars Georgy Vitsin, Lyudmila Shagalova, and Lidiya Smirnova. The movie is based on three plays by Alexander Ostrovsky: "Celebratory Daydream is Only Before Dinner", "Two Dogs Fight, the Third Keep Away" and "Whatever You Look for, You'll Find". ==Actors== * Georgy Vitsin as Misha Balzaminov * Lyudmila Shagalova as Pavla Balzamonova, his Mother * Lidiya Smirnova as Akulina Krasvina, Matchmaker * Ekaterina Savinova as Matryona * Zhanna Prokhorenko as Kapochka Nichkina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1964 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Balzaminov's Marriage
